travelPermittedobject

precond.t[894]

Superclass

Property
Summary

Summary

Details

Details

PreCondition that calls before travel notifications (such as beforeTravel() on every object in scope) so these can rule out travel/push travel before it’s attempted.

travelPermitted :   PreCondition
